memberdef.definition: CommonTypedDeviceAPI< T, P, L >::listtype mutabor::CommonTypedDeviceAPI< T, P, L >::deviceList
memberdef.name: deviceList

detaileddescription.para: This function is called when an object shall be deleted. It clears up all references to itself so that it will be deleted if it is not needed anymore.
This functions detatches the device from all routes and calls DoDestroy() afterwards. Finally the Device is going to removed from the device list.

briefdescription.para: Disconnect the device from all pairings with routes GUI data or something else.

detaileddescription.para: This function should be extended in subclasses so that after calling it only temporary pointers (variables in functions or temporary objects) point to the object.

briefdescription.para: Move the device in the device list.

parameterdescription.para: Number of places the device should be moved up. Negative values indicate downwards direction.

simplesect.para: new position in the device list.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets the internal device ids of all output devices, starting from 0 and incrementing by 1

briefdescription.para: Scan the list of input devices for a given id.

detaileddescription.para:
id (int) id to scan for
(OutputDevice) pointer to the input device with the given id if found, NULL else.
